title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Boeing 787 - Turn during taxi
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we can make turns during taxying with a Boeing 787. Making turns is not as easy as you might think with this airplane so in this video I will show you some tricks how to make turns using the aircraft systems.
